# Hello World Classes - AI Context

## About
Hello World Classes is a community-driven EdTech platform providing high-quality, free coding education to Indian students in Hindi and Hinglish. We focus on practical skills like Python, Web Development, and Data Analytics.

## Key Offerings
- **Free Courses**: Python, Full Stack Development, Data Analytics, AI & Automation.
- **Language**: Hindi & Hinglish (easy to understand).
- **Tools**: Online Code Runner, Error Explainer, Practice Quizzes, SQL Playground.
- **Philosophy**: "No Jargon, Just Code."

## Tech Stack
The platform is built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and React, featuring a futuristic Cyberpunk UI.

## Routes
- /: Home - Overview and key features.
- /skills: Detailed learning paths.
- /tools: Free developer tools.
- /blogs: Tech articles and tutorials.
- /contact: Community support.
